articles.description: If effective, a national programme will deliver up to 10,000 units of plasma a week to the NHS to help treat coronavirus (COVID-19) patients.
articles.content:
• A clinical trial has been given approval to determine if plasma donated by patients who have recovered from COVID-19 can help those battling the illness
  • If effective, a scaled-up national programme will deliver up to 10,000 units of convalesce… [+5284 chars]

articles.author: Dailyrecord.co.uk
articles.title: Twin sister nurses tragically die from coronavirus just three days apart - Daily Record
articles.description: Children's nurse Katy Davis and surgery nurse Emma both suffered from an underlying health condition when they passed away after testing positive.
articles.content:
Twin sisters who had both worked as nurses have died within three days of each other after both testing positive for Covid-19. 
 Children's nurse Katy Davis, 37, died at Southampton General Hospital on Tuesday while her identical twin, Emma, a former surgery… [+2642 chars]

articles.title: Coronavirus: Betsi death report delay sparks investigation - BBC South East Wales
articles.description: The north Wales health board reported all its deaths at once after issues with reporting systems.
articles.content:
